text: @NYGovCuomo Thank you for comments about Democratic Ky Gov Beshear. Took office in Dec 2019, defeating Matt Bivens, for whom Trump campaigned. Just set up mail-in voting, vetoed bill prohibiting abortion, handling covid-19 based on science. Logical, compassionate, articulate. Ky is so lucky.
